name: Painter Image Portfolio Library
summary: Learn about .IMAGEPORTFOLIOLIBRARY files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Painter provides various tools for illustrating artwork and editing digital photographs. The software also includes an image portfolio library, which is a storage place that helps you manage and organize your collection of images.
You can add or remove images in an image portfolio through the Media Library panel. To open this panel, select Window → Media Panels → Images and select the "Image Portfolio" tab.

instructions: You can open an IMAGEPORTFOLIOLIBRARY file with Corel Painter. For example, to open an IMAGEPORTFOLIOLIBRARY file, select Window → Media Panels → Images and click the "Import Image Portfolio" icon in the "Image Portfolio" tab.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
